entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy late this evening. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 47 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
